title: Execute Security Test Validation
description: As a security engineer, I want to run security vulnerability tests so that I can identify and mitigate potential threats.
soThat: I can identify and mitigate potential threats
acceptanceCriteria: Given security test suite is configured, when executed, then all critical vulnerabilities are detected
Given authentication mechanisms exist, when tested, then access controls are properly validated
Given test results are generated, when reviewed, then actionable security recommendations are provided
